title: Have to login every single game
body:
LoL automatically logs me out after every single game.  It says that I am disconnected.  But my other applications on my computer, like browsers, are connected to the internet.  I am using MacBook Air.  Does anyone have solution?  It is annoying me so much.

Thanks

replies.body: While you may be able to access other venues like browsers, your network can still have problems maintaining a connection to our servers specifically.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and stay connected.  Make sure to also select the Mac box for steps specific to your operating system.  That should get you fixed!
